text: But the beast was captured, and 19:20 so was the false prophet who was with him, Â¦ with him the false prophet BYZ CT PCK TRso was the false prophet who was with him, who in his sight performed the signs by which he deceived those who had received the mark of the beast and who worshiped his image. The two of them were thrown alive into the lake of fire that burns with sulfur.
